forum.name: Reflecting on and Consolidating Key Learnings From the First Half of the Course
forum.intro:
You have now completed just over half of the ANI 2.0 course. Module 1 focused on the standards for mathematics in adult education, cognitive demand, productive struggle, and fostering positive mathematics identities. Module 2 emphasized instructional routines that demonstrate equitable practices and promote mathematical discourse, and it addressed formative assessment. In Module 3, we focused on operations with whole and rational numbers through shared experiences with number talks, the use of multiple representations, and unpacking problem stems.

Now that we have covered several pedagogical and mathematical topics and practiced different routines and strategies together, itâ€™s a good time to reflect on the course.

What are your key takeaways from the course so far? Reflect on Modules 1, 2, and 3, and your experience with the synchronous and asynchronous activities. Share your thoughts in the discussion forum below. Click ADD DISCUSSION TOPIC to add a post to the forum.
